Title: The Yellow King - Part II
Descriptions: You found Hans? Man, we all thought he was dead. A bandit group led by a guy in a yellow helmet? I know exactly who that is. Everyone here knows of the Yellow King. I haven't had the misfortune of crossing paths with him for months, but he's obviously still here in Livonia. If anyone knows where he is, the Black Market Trader would. Go and speak to Scarecrow at Swarog Military Base Radio Tower. He'll help you find your man. I'm sure of it.
